full_summary:
# Procurement, Delivery and Installation of Office Furniture to Ottawa
## Notice Type | Request for Proposal
## Notice Reference | PW-22-01007415
## Solicitation Reference | 1000244554
## Notice Date | September 16, 2022
## Tender Closing Date | October 3, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
## Expected Contract Date | Not specified
## Tender Status | Expired

## Background
Health Canada has a requirement to purchase, deliver, and install office furniture to Ottawa by March 31st, 2023. This procurement is conducted through the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) Supply Arrangement (SA) E60PQ-140003/xxx/PQ.

## Goods/Services Required
The procured office furniture must meet the requirements of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region).

## Requirements
• Please note that there is a security requirement associated with this procurement. For further information, please consult the bid solicitation document.
• The procured goods must meet the requirements outlined in the bid solicitation document.

## Documents
For more information, please refer to the attached documents:
• Solicitation Document (English)
• Request for Quotes (English and French)
• Bid Solicitation Document (English)

## Contact Information
Christian Belanger
christian.belanger@canada.ca
613-697-0681
200 Eglantine Driveway, Tunney's Pasture, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K9

## Important Notes
• This procurement is subject to the principles of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
• All bids must comply with the requirements outlined in the bid solicitation document.
• A confidentiality agreement will be required for a bidder's trade secrets and intellectual property.
• The bid solicitation document should be consulted for a full list of requirements and additional information.  Please note the briefing package is confidential information. Please contact the Contracting Authority for further information.  Faxed bids will not be accepted. E-Bid is the recommended method for bid submission, however, hard copy bid will be accepted. Under separate cover, FAQs will be provided by the Contracting Authority.  Contact Christian belanger christian.belanger@canada.ca for information relating to this notice.

---

In this rewritten version, I improved clarity and concision while maintaining the original information. All important details are included without redundancy. The rewritten text
